name: 江怡君
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

scorePolicy:
Average of Weekly Quizzes * 20% (每週小考)
Oral Presentation * 5 % (口頭報告)
Commenting * 5% (即席評論)
Composition * 10% (作文)
Group Project * 10% (團體表演)
Final Exam—Listening * 10% (聽力期末考)
Final Exam—Reading * 10% (閱讀期末考)
Mid-term Campus-wide English Proficiency Test * 15% (期中會考)
Final Campus-wide English Proficiency Test * 15% (期末會考)

(預習和作業) Students are required to preview assigned reading and do homework. The instructor will check homework at irregular intervals. If a student is found to not have done the homework, 20 points will be deducted from his or her quiz that week.

(小考和補考) Weekly quizzes are always administered at the beginning of the class. Late students can ask for make-up quizzes administered by the teaching assistant, but 20 points will be automatically deducted. An absent student, with or without a justifiable reason, cannot ask for a make-up quiz. Yet, for all students, one lowest quiz grade needs not to be factored into the average calculation.
��
(作文) Students are required to write a composition of 250 words. It can be submitted any time during the semester but no later than May 28th, 2010. Otherwise, it will be given a zero automatically.
��
(團體表演) With regard to the group project, students are free to decide the form and content. However, the chosen form and content should be approved by the instructor in advance. Some suggested forms for the performed project are debate, skit, etc.
��
(口頭報告及即席評論) Students are required to give an oral presentation on any chosen topic for 3 minutes. A previously arranged commentator will comment on the presentation for 1 minute.
��
(小老師) Teaching assistant will be awarded 3 bonus points to his or her final grade.
��
(作弊或抄襲) Any student caught cheating or plagiarizing in quizzes, exams, compositions, or projects will be given a zero for his or her final grade without any room of negotiation.
